titleStmt.title: W. D. Brownlee and J. B. Brownlee, Bond
CWG6690

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p: A H Brownlee being in custody charged with the Crime of maliciously & unlawfully shooting Alexander G Renfro with intent to kill and being admitted to bail in the sum of Five Hundred Dollars now we W D Brownlee & and John B Brownlee do hereby undertake that the above A H Brownlee will appear in the Hart Circuit Court on the first day of next April term to consider said charge and will at all times render himself amenable to the order and process of said Court in the prosecution of said charge and if convicted will render himself in execution thereof or if he shall fail to perform either of these conditions that we will pay to the Commonwealth of Ky the sum of Five Hundred Dollars, Witness our hands this 15 day of Jun 1865

W D Brownlee
J B Brownlee
Taken and subscribed before us as Justices of the peace of Hart County

G W Collins J P H C
Wm E Pucker J P H C
A Copy
M H Compton C H C C
